definition: Hong Kong, abbr. for 香港[Xiang1 gang3]/surname Gang
"water" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 85), occurring in 没, 法, 流 etc/see also 三點水|三点水[san1 dian3 shui3]
Hong Kong 香港 and Macao 澳門|澳门
Hong Kong 香港, Macao 澳門|澳门 and Taiwan 臺灣|台湾[Tai2 wan1]
airport (abbr. for 航空港[hang2 kong1 gang3])

sentences.english: One copy of inspection Report on Quantity and Quality issued SGS at loading port.
sentences.chinese: 装货港SGS数量及重量检验报告，一份副本。

sentences.english: He grew upin Port Arthur, Tex., never knowing his father.
sentences.chinese: 他在亚瑟港长大，从不知道父亲是谁。

sentences.english: Port street layout can be traced to the 16th century hero stabbed in Hong Kong was first built.
sentences.chinese: 港口街道布局可追搠到16世纪英雄港初建时。

sentences.english: Today the Iraqi artillery attacked the Al-Fao port.
sentences.chinese: 今天，伊拉克大炮攻击了法奥港。

sentences.english: Now there are 7 Chinese sturgeons left which the park originally received from the mainland.
sentences.chinese: 大陆共赠港10条国宝级的中华鲟，现在剩7条。

sentences.english: Lu'anzhou port under construction will be the largest gateway to the outside world of Changzhou.
sentences.chinese: 在建的常州录安洲港，是常州最大的对外开放门户。

sentences.english: The port is surgically inserted under the skin's surface on the upper chest wall.
sentences.chinese: 输液港是通过手术植入胸壁上的皮肤下面。

sentences.english: Gwadar is where dreams clash with reality.
sentences.chinese: 瓜达尔港是梦想与现实的相互冲突的战场。

sentences.english: The ships are anchored in the harbour, safe from the typhoon.
sentences.chinese: 船只已在港内下了锚，不会受到台风的威胁。

sentences.english: Black tulips, right here in China, not anywhere else, right at the Shanghai Flower Port.
sentences.chinese: 黑郁金香，不在别处，就在中国，在上海鲜花港。

sentences.english: The port of Mawei, the main port of Fuzhou, is located in the alluvial delta of the Fuzhou Basin.
sentences.chinese: 处在四周由中低山环抱的福州盆地内的马尾港。

sentences.english: Miners knocking back middies in Port Hedland yesterday had reason to cheer.
sentences.chinese: 昨日在黑德兰港痛饮的矿工们有理由欢呼。

sentences.english: Shenzhen, the Chinese People’s Liberation Army’s naval destroyer, entered Tokyo Bay.
sentences.chinese: 中国人民解放军的深圳号驱逐舰进入了东京港。

sentences.english: Love is the willingness to be someone's haven against wind and rain in his or her struggle with life.
sentences.chinese: 爱是愿意成为对方迎战人生，遮风避雨的安全港。

sentences.english: Wed like to change the unloading port from Tokyo to Osaka.
sentences.chinese: 我们愿意把卸货港由东京改为大阪。

sentences.english: In port he preferred to run on deck, even in the coldest weather.
sentences.chinese: 在港内时，他还是喜欢在甲板上跑，不管天气有多冷。

definition: Xingang or Hsinkang township in Chiayi county 嘉義縣|嘉义县[Jia1 yi4 xian4], west Taiwan
Nankang district of Taipei City 臺北市|台北市[Tai2 bei3 shi4], Taiwan
airport (abbr. for 航空港[hang2 kong1 gang3])
